name: Servicia
shortDescription: A modern review platform for services like cleaning, plumbing, and repair. User can add and review any services without any cost. This platform helps to find out how good a service are.
longDescription: Servicia is a full-stack web app where users can explore services, read/write reviews, and rate providers. Admins can manage service categories and monitor platform activity.
challengesFaced: Building an admin dashboard from scratch
futureOptimizations: Add real-time chat between users and service providers
Mobile app version using React Native

name: Ahad Car
shortDescription: Car rental & ride-sharing platform inspired by Uber.Ahad Car offers users the ability to rent vehicles or book rides. Includes real-time booking, driver dashboards, and Stripe payments.
longDescription: Ahad Car offers users the ability to rent vehicles or book rides. Includes real-time booking, driver dashboards, and Stripe payments.
futureOptimizations: Live tracking with Google Maps API

name: T-Tube
shortDescription: A minimalist video streaming platform like YouTube.T-Tube lets users explore trending videos, like/comment/share, and upload their own content. Admins can moderate uploads and manage users.
longDescription: T-Tube lets users explore trending videos, like/comment/share, and upload their own content. Admins can moderate uploads and manage users.
futureOptimizations: Recommendation system using user watch history

name: Flavor Gaven
shortDescription: A stylish online food ordering system for restaurants.Users can browse dishes, place orders, and make secure payments. Admins can add/remove menu items and manage orders with real-time updates.
longDescription: Users can browse dishes, place orders, and make secure payments. Admins can add/remove menu items and manage orders with real-time updates.

name: Movie Portal
shortDescription: Discover and explore movies with rating and reviews.Movie Portal is a film directory web app where users can view movie info, add reviews, and save favorites. Admin dashboard for managing listings.
longDescription: Movie Portal is a film directory web app where users can view movie info, add reviews, and save favorites. Admin dashboard for managing listings.
challengesFaced: Dark theme layout with full responsiveness
